query: CREATE TABLE a_star ( class		char, a 			int4 )
expected: CREATE TABLE a_star (class CHAR(1), a INT)

query: CREATE TABLE b_star ( b 			text ) INHERITS (a_star)
expected: CREATE TABLE b_star (b TEXT) INHERITS (a_star)

query: CREATE TABLE c_star ( c 			name ) INHERITS (a_star)
expected: CREATE TABLE c_star (c name) INHERITS (a_star)

query: CREATE TABLE d_star ( d 			float8 ) INHERITS (b_star, c_star)
expected: CREATE TABLE d_star (d FLOAT8) INHERITS (b_star, c_star)

query: CREATE TABLE e_star ( e 			int2 ) INHERITS (c_star)
expected: CREATE TABLE e_star (e SMALLINT) INHERITS (c_star)

query: CREATE TABLE f_star ( f 			polygon ) INHERITS (e_star)
expected: CREATE TABLE f_star (f polygon) INHERITS (e_star)

query: INSERT INTO a_star (class, a) VALUES ('a', 1)
INSERT INTO a_star (class, a) VALUES ('a', 2)
INSERT INTO a_star (class) VALUES ('a')
INSERT INTO b_star (class, a, b) VALUES ('b', 3, 'mumble'::text)
expected: INSERT INTO b_star (class, a, b) VALUES ('b', 3, CAST('mumble' AS TEXT))

query: INSERT INTO b_star (class, a) VALUES ('b', 4)
INSERT INTO b_star (class, b) VALUES ('b', 'bumble'::text)
expected: INSERT INTO b_star (class, b) VALUES ('b', CAST('bumble' AS TEXT))

query: INSERT INTO b_star (class) VALUES ('b')
INSERT INTO c_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('c', 5, 'hi mom'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO c_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('c', 5, CAST('hi mom' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO c_star (class, a) VALUES ('c', 6)
INSERT INTO c_star (class, c) VALUES ('c', 'hi paul'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO c_star (class, c) VALUES ('c', CAST('hi paul' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO c_star (class) VALUES ('c')
INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b, c, d) VALUES ('d', 7, 'grumble'::text, 'hi sunita'::name, '0.0'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b, c, d) VALUES ('d', 7, CAST('grumble' AS TEXT), CAST('hi sunita' AS name), CAST('0.0' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b, c) VALUES ('d', 8, 'stumble'::text, 'hi koko'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b, c) VALUES ('d', 8, CAST('stumble' AS TEXT), CAST('hi koko' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b, d) VALUES ('d', 9, 'rumble'::text, '1.1'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b, d) VALUES ('d', 9, CAST('rumble' AS TEXT), CAST('1.1' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, c, d) VALUES ('d', 10, 'hi kristin'::name, '10.01'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, c, d) VALUES ('d', 10, CAST('hi kristin' AS name), CAST('10.01' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b, c, d) VALUES ('d', 'crumble'::text, 'hi boris'::name, '100.001'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b, c, d) VALUES ('d', CAST('crumble' AS TEXT), CAST('hi boris' AS name), CAST('100.001' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b) VALUES ('d', 11, 'fumble'::text)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, b) VALUES ('d', 11, CAST('fumble' AS TEXT))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('d', 12, 'hi avi'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('d', 12, CAST('hi avi' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, d) VALUES ('d', 13, '1000.0001'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a, d) VALUES ('d', 13, CAST('1000.0001' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b, c) VALUES ('d', 'tumble'::text, 'hi andrew'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b, c) VALUES ('d', CAST('tumble' AS TEXT), CAST('hi andrew' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b, d) VALUES ('d', 'humble'::text, '10000.00001'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b, d) VALUES ('d', CAST('humble' AS TEXT), CAST('10000.00001' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, c, d) VALUES ('d', 'hi ginger'::name, '100000.000001'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, c, d) VALUES ('d', CAST('hi ginger' AS name), CAST('100000.000001' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, a) VALUES ('d', 14)
INSERT INTO d_star (class, b) VALUES ('d', 'jumble'::text)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, b) VALUES ('d', CAST('jumble' AS TEXT))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, c) VALUES ('d', 'hi jolly'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, c) VALUES ('d', CAST('hi jolly' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class, d) VALUES ('d', '1000000.0000001'::float8)
expected: INSERT INTO d_star (class, d) VALUES ('d', CAST('1000000.0000001' AS FLOAT8))

query: INSERT INTO d_star (class) VALUES ('d')
INSERT INTO e_star (class, a, c, e) VALUES ('e', 15, 'hi carol'::name, '-1'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO e_star (class, a, c, e) VALUES ('e', 15, CAST('hi carol' AS name), CAST('-1' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO e_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('e', 16, 'hi bob'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO e_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('e', 16, CAST('hi bob' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO e_star (class, a, e) VALUES ('e', 17, '-2'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO e_star (class, a, e) VALUES ('e', 17, CAST('-2' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO e_star (class, c, e) VALUES ('e', 'hi michelle'::name, '-3'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO e_star (class, c, e) VALUES ('e', CAST('hi michelle' AS name), CAST('-3' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO e_star (class, a) VALUES ('e', 18)
INSERT INTO e_star (class, c) VALUES ('e', 'hi elisa'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO e_star (class, c) VALUES ('e', CAST('hi elisa' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO e_star (class, e) VALUES ('e', '-4'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO e_star (class, e) VALUES ('e', CAST('-4' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c, e, f) VALUES ('f', 19, 'hi claire'::name, '-5'::int2, '(1,3),(2,4)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c, e, f) VALUES ('f', 19, CAST('hi claire' AS name), CAST('-5' AS SMALLINT), CAST('(1,3),(2,4)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c, e) VALUES ('f', 20, 'hi mike'::name, '-6'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c, e) VALUES ('f', 20, CAST('hi mike' AS name), CAST('-6' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c, f) VALUES ('f', 21, 'hi marcel'::name, '(11,44),(22,55),(33,66)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c, f) VALUES ('f', 21, CAST('hi marcel' AS name), CAST('(11,44),(22,55),(33,66)' AS polygon))
INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, e, f) VALUES ('f', 22, CAST('-7' AS SMALLINT), CAST('(111,555),(222,666),(333,777),(444,888)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c, e, f) VALUES ('f', 'hi keith'::name, '-8'::int2, '(1111,3333),(2222,4444)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c, e, f) VALUES ('f', CAST('hi keith' AS name), CAST('-8' AS SMALLINT), CAST('(1111,3333),(2222,4444)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('f', 24, 'hi marc'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, c) VALUES ('f', 24, CAST('hi marc' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, e) VALUES ('f', 25, '-9'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, e) VALUES ('f', 25, CAST('-9' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, f) VALUES ('f', 26, '(11111,33333),(22222,44444)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a, f) VALUES ('f', 26, CAST('(11111,33333),(22222,44444)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c, e) VALUES ('f', 'hi allison'::name, '-10'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c, e) VALUES ('f', CAST('hi allison' AS name), CAST('-10' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c, f) VALUES ('f', 'hi jeff'::name, '(111111,333333),(222222,444444)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c, f) VALUES ('f', CAST('hi jeff' AS name), CAST('(111111,333333),(222222,444444)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, e, f) VALUES ('f', '-11'::int2, '(1111111,3333333),(2222222,4444444)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, e, f) VALUES ('f', CAST('-11' AS SMALLINT), CAST('(1111111,3333333),(2222222,4444444)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, a) VALUES ('f', 27)
INSERT INTO f_star (class, c) VALUES ('f', 'hi carl'::name)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, c) VALUES ('f', CAST('hi carl' AS name))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, e) VALUES ('f', '-12'::int2)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, e) VALUES ('f', CAST('-12' AS SMALLINT))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class, f) VALUES ('f', '(11111111,33333333),(22222222,44444444)'::polygon)
expected: INSERT INTO f_star (class, f) VALUES ('f', CAST('(11111111,33333333),(22222222,44444444)' AS polygon))

query: INSERT INTO f_star (class) VALUES ('f')
ANALYZE a_star
ANALYZE b_star
ANALYZE c_star
ANALYZE d_star
ANALYZE e_star
ANALYZE f_star
SELECT * FROM a_star*
expected: SELECT * FROM a_star

query: SELECT * FROM b_star* x WHERE x.b = text 'bumble' or x.a < 3
expected: SELECT * FROM b_star AS x WHERE x.b = CAST('bumble' AS TEXT) OR x.a < 3

query: SELECT class, a FROM c_star* x WHERE x.c ~ text 'hi'
expected: SELECT class, a FROM c_star AS x WHERE x.c ~ CAST('hi' AS TEXT)

query: SELECT class, b, c FROM d_star* x WHERE x.a < 100
expected: SELECT class, b, c FROM d_star AS x WHERE x.a < 100

query: SELECT class, c FROM e_star* x WHERE x.c NOTNULL
expected: SELECT class, c FROM e_star AS x WHERE x.c IS NOT NULL

query: SELECT * FROM f_star* x WHERE x.c ISNULL
expected: SELECT * FROM f_star AS x WHERE x.c IS NULL

query: SELECT sum(a) FROM a_star*
expected: SELECT SUM(a) FROM a_star

query: SELECT class, sum(a) FROM a_star* GROUP BY class ORDER BY class
expected: SELECT class, SUM(a) FROM a_star GROUP BY class ORDER BY class

query: ALTER TABLE f_star RENAME COLUMN f TO ff
ALTER TABLE e_star* RENAME COLUMN e TO ee
expected: ALTER TABLE e_star RENAME COLUMN e TO ee

query: ALTER TABLE d_star* RENAME COLUMN d TO dd
expected: ALTER TABLE d_star RENAME COLUMN d TO dd

query: ALTER TABLE c_star* RENAME COLUMN c TO cc
expected: ALTER TABLE c_star RENAME COLUMN c TO cc

query: ALTER TABLE b_star* RENAME COLUMN b TO bb
expected: ALTER TABLE b_star RENAME COLUMN b TO bb

query: ALTER TABLE a_star* RENAME COLUMN a TO aa
expected: ALTER TABLE a_star RENAME COLUMN a TO aa

query: SELECT class, aa FROM a_star* x WHERE aa ISNULL
expected: SELECT class, aa FROM a_star AS x WHERE aa IS NULL

query: ALTER TABLE a_star RENAME COLUMN aa TO foo
SELECT class, foo FROM a_star* x WHERE x.foo >= 2
expected: SELECT class, foo FROM a_star AS x WHERE x.foo >= 2

query: ALTER TABLE a_star RENAME COLUMN foo TO aa
SELECT * from a_star* WHERE aa < 1000
expected: SELECT * FROM a_star WHERE aa < 1000

query: ALTER TABLE f_star ADD COLUMN f int4
expected: ALTER TABLE f_star ADD COLUMN f INT

query: UPDATE f_star SET f = 10
ALTER TABLE e_star* ADD COLUMN e int4
expected: ALTER TABLE e_star ADD COLUMN e INT

query: SELECT * FROM e_star*
expected: SELECT * FROM e_star

query: ALTER TABLE a_star* ADD COLUMN a text
expected: ALTER TABLE a_star ADD COLUMN a TEXT

query: SELECT relname, reltoastrelid <> 0 AS has_toast_table FROM pg_class WHERE oid::regclass IN ('a_star', 'c_star') ORDER BY 1
expected: SELECT relname, reltoastrelid <> 0 AS has_toast_table FROM pg_class WHERE CAST(oid AS regclass) IN ('a_star', 'c_star') ORDER BY 1

query: SELECT class, aa, a FROM a_star*
expected: SELECT class, aa, a FROM a_star
